vote.title:
A public hearing to receive comments regarding an application for and an ordinance granting an RR Regional Retail District and a resolution accepting deed restrictions volunteered by the applicant, on property zoned a CR-D Commercial Retail District with a D Liquor Control Overlay, on the south side of Morrell Avenue, between East Waco Avenue and South Corinth Road
Recommendation of Staff and CPC:  Approval, subject to deed restrictions volunteered by the applicant and retention of the D Liquor Control Overlay
Z189-339(JM/CT)
